n: Wild West Coast Seafood Shrimp Cocktail Sauce
des: "Owning a boat on Vancouver Island, seafood IS dinner 4 to 5 times a week. This great sauce goes with oysters, halibut, cod, shrimp and wild Pacific salmon. I hope you like it too!"
ins: Stir together ketchup, horseradish, garlic, chili powder, and allspice in a small bowl. Cover bowl; refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.
